settings.pageDescription: Manage system-wide settings and perform reset operations.

languageSettings.title: Language Settings
languageSettings.description: Choose the display language for the admin dashboard.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: These actions are irreversible and can lead to permanent data loss. Proceed with extreme caution.

resetVoterStatus.title: Reset Voter Status
resetVoterStatus.description: Resets the 'hasVoted' status for all voters, allowing them to vote again. Vote counts are not cleared.

resetElectionResults.title: Reset Election Results
resetElectionResults.description: Deletes all cast votes and resets vote counts to zero for all elections.

deleteAllVoters.title: Delete All Voters
deleteAllVoters.description: Permanently deletes all voter records from the system. This action cannot be undone.

resetAllElections.title: Reset All Elections
resetAllElections.description: Deletes all elections, candidates, and related data. The system will be empty.
